text: "Lines on Palms" is a song by Australian singer-songwriter Josh Pyke. It was released in March 2007 as the second single from Pyke's debut studio album, Memories & Dust. The song peaked at number 33, becoming Pyke's highest charting single. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2007) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:2007 singles Category:Josh Pyke songs
title: Lines on Palms
